conclusion: Analyze paths from points A, B, C, and D to containers E and F.
Liquid encounters a baffle directing it to the right from A.
Liquid continues downward and flows into container E from A.
Liquid encounters a baffle directing it to the left from B.
Liquid continues downward and flows into container E from B.
Liquid encounters a baffle directing it to the right from C.
Liquid continues downward and flows into container F from C.
Liquid encounters a baffle directing it to the left from D.
Liquid continues downward and flows into container F from D.
Liquid from points A and B will flow into container E.
Liquid from points C and D will flow into container F.
Container E will receive liquid from points A and B.
Container F will receive liquid from points C and D.
